languages.text: "Приказ ясен, Вольный Торговец. Прошу прощения, что действовал без вашего позволения — более не стану вмешиваться в происходящее на флагмане".

traits.locale_text: "Прошу прощения, {name}. Вы правы, я забылся. Сейчас у нас есть более важные задачи".

languages.text: "Your order is clear, Rogue Trader. I apologise for acting without your permission — I will no longer interfere in what is happening on the flagship."
languages.original_text: "Приказ ясен, Вольный Торговец. Прошу прощения, что действовал без вашего позволения — более не стану вмешиваться в происходящее на флагмане".

traits.locale_text: "Your order is clear, Rogue Trader. I apologise for acting without your permission — I will no longer interfere in what is happening on the flagship."
"Your order is clear, Rogue Trader. I apologise for acting without your permission — I will no longer interfere in what is happening on the flagship."
"Your order is clear, Rogue Trader. I apologise for acting without your permission — I will no longer interfere in what is happening on the flagship."
"Your order is clear, Rogue Trader. I apologise for acting without your permission — I will no longer interfere in what is happening on the flagship."
"Your order is clear, Rogue Trader. I apologise for acting without your permission — I will no longer interfere in what is happening on the flagship."

languages.text: 「ご命令、しかと承りました、ローグトレーダー。許可を得ずに行動したことをお詫びします。今後は旗艦内で起きていることには干渉いたしません」
languages.original_text: "Your order is clear, Rogue Trader. I apologise for acting without your permission — I will no longer interfere in what is happening on the flagship."

traits.locale_text: 「ご命令、しかと承りました、ローグトレーダー。許可を得ずに行動したことをお詫びします。今後は旗艦内で起きていることには干渉いたしません」

languages.text: "Anlaşılmıştır Hür Tacir. İzniniz olmadan hareket ettiğim için özür dilerim. Bundan böyle sancak gemisinde olup bitenlere müdahalede bulunmayacağım."
languages.original_text: "Your order is clear, Rogue Trader. I apologise for acting without your permission — I will no longer interfere in what is happening on the flagship."

traits.locale_text: "Anlaşılmıştır Hür Tacir. İzniniz olmadan hareket ettiğim için özür dilerim. Bundan böyle sancak gemisinde olup bitene müdahalede bulunmayacağım."

languages.text: «Su orden es muy clara, Comerciante Independiente. Lamento haber actuado sin permiso. No volveré a interferir en lo que sucede en la nave insignia».
languages.original_text: "Your order is clear, Rogue Trader. I apologise for acting without your permission — I will no longer interfere in what is happening on the flagship."

traits.locale_text: «Su orden es muy clara, Comerciante Independiente. Lamento haber actuado sin permiso. No volveré a interferir en lo que sucede en la nave insignia».

languages.text: “你的命令非常明确，行商浪人。我未经允许擅自做主，我为此道歉。从今往后，我再也不会干涉这艘旗舰上的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Your order is clear, Rogue Trader. I apologise for acting without your permission — I will no longer interfere in what is happening on the flagship."

traits.locale_text: “你的命令非常明确，行商浪人。我未经允许擅自做主，我为此道歉。从今往后，我再也不会干涉这艘旗舰上的事情。”

languages.text: « À vos ordres, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je vous présente mes excuses pour avoir agi sans votre permission. Je ne m'immiscerai plus dans la gestion du personnel de votre vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "Your order is clear, Rogue Trader. I apologise for acting without your permission — I will no longer interfere in what is happening on the flagship."

traits.locale_text: « À vos ordres, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je vous présente mes excuses pour avoir agi sans votre permission. Je ne m'immiscerai plus dans la gestion du personnel de votre vaisseau. »

languages.text: "Euer Befehl ist eindeutig, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich entschuldige mich für mein eigenmächtiges Handeln ... ich werde mich nicht mehr in die Belange des Flaggschiffs einmischen."
languages.original_text: "Your order is clear, Rogue Trader. I apologise for acting without your permission — I will no longer interfere in what is happening on the flagship."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Befehl ist eindeutig, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich entschuldige mich für mein eigenmächtiges Handeln ... ich werde mich nicht mehr in die Belange des Flaggschiffs einmischen."
